sentence: The PowerShares Dynamic Building & Construction Portfolio ETF ( PKB ) is seeing unusually high volume in afternoon trading Wednesday, with over 399,000 shares traded versus three month average volume of about 45,000.
Shares of PKB were down about 0.9% on the day.

Components of that ETF with the highest volume on Wednesday were Home Depot ( HD ), trading up about 0.3% with over 2.2 million shares changing hands so far this session, and Louisiana Pacific ( LPX ), off about 2.4% on volume of over 2.1 million shares.

The Howard Hughes ( HHC ) is the component faring the best Wednesday, higher by about 0.6% on the day, while Aegion ( AEGN ) is lagging other components of the PowerShares Dynamic Building & Construction Portfolio ETF, trading lower by about 7.3%.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
